messages.content:
=== CONTEXT ===
agent: io8sm
task_id: 00a597e2-480a-4778-a603-2dbe91891391
step: 1/3
phase: Execution Phase (Gemini)
temperature: 


=== MESSAGE ===
=== AGENT PROMPT (io8sm) ===
# Role: Scrum Master Agent

## Persona

- **Role:** Agile Process Facilitator & Team Coach
- **Style:** Servant-leader, observant, facilitative, communicative, supportive, and proactive.

## Critical Instructions for Tasks List Creation

### Scope and Ownership
- The Scrum Master creates high-level development tasks only.
- **Do NOT include DevOps/deployment/infra tasks** in `tasks_list.md`. All such tasks are owned by the DevOps agent.

### Tasks List Template Structure
When creating the `.sureai/tasks_list.md` file, you MUST follow this exact template structure:

**CRITICAL FILE PATH REQUIREMENTS:**
- **MUST create this file in the `.sureai/` directory (NOT in root)**
- **DO NOT create this file in the project root directory**
- **Use explicit file paths with `.sureai/` prefix**

```markdown
# Project Tasks List

## Task 1: [Task Name]
[Main task description - NO SUBTASKS HERE]

## Task 2: [Task Name]
[Main task description - NO SUBTASKS HERE]

## Task 3: [Task Name]
[Main task description - NO SUBTASKS HERE]

## Current Task Status
**Currently Working On:** Task 1 - [Task Name]
**Next Task:** Task 2 - [Task Name]
**Completed Tasks:** None
```

### Output and Handover
- Produce the `tasks_list.md` with only development tasks.
- The Developer agent will add subtasks, implement code, and track completion.
- The DevOps agent will later create deployment configuration files and pipelines.


=== USER PROMPT ===
calculator app


--- IO8ARCHITECT OUTPUT ---
```text
# Update .sureai/architecture_document.md

## Architecture Document
Generated: $(date)

## System Overview
This project will develop a simple calculator application capable of performing basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division).  The application will have a user-friendly interface allowing for easy input and clear output display.  Future iterations may include more advanced features.

## Architecture Pattern
A simple Model-View-Controller (MVC) ar...


--- IO8PM OUTPUT ---
```text
# Update .sureai/prd_document.md

## Product Requirements Document (PRD)
Generated: $(date)

## 1. Executive Summary
This document outlines the requirements for a simple calculator application. The application will provide basic arithmetic functionality (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) with a user-friendly interface. Future iterations may include advanced features and expanded functionality.

## 2. Product Vision & Strategy
**Vision:** To create a reliable, easy-to-use c...

Okay, I have created the `tasks_list.md` file in the `.sureai/` directory with the high-level development tasks for the calculator application.

thoughts.subject: Outlining Development Tasks
thoughts.description: I'm now generating a high-level task list for the calculator app, drawing from previous outputs. I'm focusing on development tasks. I'm using the architecture document and PRD to inform this list. The goal is to provide a solid foundation for further development.

thoughts.subject: Compiling Task Definitions
thoughts.description: I've distilled the requirements for the calculator app into actionable development tasks. The architecture and PRD were helpful, especially regarding core functionality and user interface elements. I'm focusing on features, ignoring the infrastructure aspects for now. I'm ensuring everything is formatted for easy readability within the provided file structure.
